2 ^ O God: 3 ^ Let them be confounded and ashamed
4 ^ Let them be turned backward and blush for shame that desire evils to me~; let them be presently turned away blushing for shame that say to me
5 ^ Let all that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee
column4:
those who love thy salvation.
6 ^ But I am needy and poor~; O God, help me. Thou art my helper and my deliverer~; O Lord, make no delay.
